WorkItem.Description: Do you have any code ready which works for EDI 820 format.

Comments.Message: Yes, I can add the EDI 820 Specification.  I don't actually have the official spec for anything but the HIPAA set, so if you have some links to companion guides or specs or have a sample edi that I can add to my unit tests, it will ensure that the spec I create will meet your needs.
I have one. Let me know if you need anything. http://www.mortgagebankers.org/files/Technology/EDI820.pdf

I have checked in the specification and tested it against the sample edi in the document.  I will mark this issue fixed, but I will not close it until I get a few more sample edi to add to the unit tests.
I will also add some more of the segment translations of the elements before I create another release.
Enjoy!
Thank you so much for your quick turnaround. I really appreciate it.
